titleStmt.title: Mans inbred malady, or The doctrine of original sin maintained, as also the necessity of infants baptism. / By George Burches B.D. late Rector of Wood-Church in Cheshire.
titleStmt.author: Burches, George, d. 1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, and are to be sold by Thomas Johnson at the Golden Key in Saint Paul's Church-yard.,
